Skills:
Major contracting group in Saudi Arabia require an experienced Construction Manager with at least 15 years total experience. To be considered candidates should have least 3 years experience as a Construction Manager and should have a strong background in Construction / Build projects.
Candidates can only be considered who have a degree in Civil / Structural Engineering as well as a proven background working with main contractors. Candidates MUST be willing to work in Al Ula.
BSc Civil / Structural Engineering
15 years experience
Proven Construction Management experience within main contractors
Build / Construction projects such as High Rise, Commercial, Healthcare, Residential etc....
